document_data.name: Slumberward
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell protected the caster or a targeted creature from sleepiness, tiredness, and similar conditions brought on by a spell or magical condition, including charms and enchantments. It offered some protection from willpower-based spells such as ''[[command]]'' and ''[[suggestion]]''. The spell did not protect against the effects of drugs or poisons. It also did not protect from being stunned and did not prevent unconsciousness from a physical strike.
document_data.Components: The spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.History: ''Slumberward'' was one of the spells within ''[[Galadaster's Orizon]]''.
